summary: Kharis the mummy is given a sacred potion that grants him eternal life to search for his lost love, Princess Ananka, despite the unending curse that haunts them.
cast: John Carradine|Robert Lowery|Ramsay Ames|Barton MacLane|George Zucco|Frank Reicher|Harry Shannon|Emmett Vogan|Lester Sharpe|Claire Whitney|Oscar O'Shea|Lon Chaney Jr.|Steve Barclay|David Bruce|Noble 'Kid' Chissell|Caroline Frances Cooke|Oliver Cross|William Desmond|Bess Flowers|Fay Holderness|Michael Jeffers|Mira McKinney|Jack Perrin|Jack Rockwell|Jack C. Smith|Pietro Sosso|Ivan Triesault|Dorothy Vaughan|Carl Vernell|Martha Vickers|Eddy Waller|Anthony Warde
director: Director: Reginald Le Borg (as Reginald LeBorg)
title: El fantasma de la momia
